function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global crises triggered by COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of healthcare systems, economic instability, and loss of life","Mitigation":"Public health measures, economic support, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and international agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of water, food, and poor health conditions","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases and overall decline in health","Mitigation":"Investment in clean water infrastructure, sustainable agriculture, and healthcare access","Technologies":"Water purification systems, precision agriculture, and telehealth services","People":"Communities with limited resources and inadequate infrastructure","Owner":"Local governments, NGOs, and international aid organizations"}]}
